short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Youtube with crowdsourced time-synced comments. Anonymously comment, any time, any video -- no log in required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to be unobtrusive. Sleek, minimal interface. Highly configurable: hide, show, hide input box, opacity, size, coverage, speed etc etc
